typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SSN as integer,
		First_Name as string,
		Phone_N as string,
		Last_M as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1oltp
source(output(
		SSN as integer,
		First_Name as string,
		Phone_N as string,
		Last_M as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1oltp, source1 exists(source1oltp@SSN == source1@SSN,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
source1oltp, source1 exists(source1oltp@SSN == source1@SSN,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NotExists2
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		SSN as integer,
		First_Name as string,
		Phone_N as string,
		Last_M as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
NotExists2 sink(input(
		SSN as integer,
		First_Name as string,
		Phone_N as string,
		Last_M as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		SSN,
		First_Name,
		Phone_N,
		Last_M
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2
